snippet.title: Trine 2: Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Discover a bit more the wonderful universe of Trine 2, through this magnificent video trailer presenting the three heroes of the game, Pontius the Knight, Zoya the Thief and Amadeus the Wizard, evolving through the gorgeous environments of the game. A dangerous adventure awaits them, as numerous traps, puzzles and impressive monsters will try to get in their way. Help them succeed in their grand quest by teaming up with friends! 

Trine 2 is now available in retail stores in an exclusive Collector's Edition: for a mere £17,99/19,99€, this version includes the original soundtrack of the game by composer Ari Pulkkinen (Angry Birds, Outland fame), a wonderful artbook with developer commentary, as well as a download of the first Trine game!

Visit the official website: http://promo-trine2.com/
